channel.title: My New Server -Dodian
channel.description:
Ok guys well I started coding a new server based from dodian. Umm I think its going pretty well right now. I have added fully working magic ancients and normal. I have added special handlers so that means all the weapons have good special amount like runescape and same attack as runescape. I have added perfect range system projectiles work everything works special attacks. I have added perfect teleporting don't have a pic for that put im not lying. Well im working on a christmas event I really don't know why lol this server wont be up when its christmas. I have added alot more I have made attack tab show only on wildy. Wildy skull on appears on wildy. Ancient teleports are same as runescape. Umm im working on following and lunar. Then After I complete the basic's like all skills and stuff like that. I will be adding minigames. I will relese it when Im done. I will be adding alot of quests on this also. And also if you wan't to help me you can pm me and stuff like that w/e lol. Ok well here are some pictures and [s]vid thats coming soon waiting for it to load..[/s]
Vid
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2060y8l&s=5
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2u9ms1f.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/16s8p2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1z3xwzk.jpg[/img]
